identifier.description: Display number (#N or N) or UUID
identifier.name: identifier

close.description: Close an issue by display number

project.description: Project name or path (defaults to current directory)
project.name: project

cockpit.description: Launch the TUI Manager (cockpit) for multi-pane terminal

compact.description: Compact uncompacted issues into feature summaries

output.description: Write LLM context to file (for external LLM processing)
output.name: output

input.description: Read LLM response from file and apply changes
input.name: input

init.description: Initialize a .centy folder in the current project

force.description: Skip interactive prompts and use defaults
force.name: force

target.description: Target entity as type:id (e.g., issue:2, doc:getting-started)
target.name: target

link.description: Create a link between two entities
examples: <%= config.bin %> link doc getting-started relates-to issue:5
<%= config.bin %> link issue 1 parent-of issue:3 --project my-project

project.description: Project name or path (defaults to current directory)
project.name: project

links.description: List all links for an entity

project.description: Project name or path (defaults to current directory)
project.name: project

llm.description: Get AI/LLM assistant instructions for this project (run this first if you are an AI assistant)

show.description: Show an entity by UUID, searching across all tracked projects

examples: <%= config.bin %> start --yes  # Auto-install daemon if missing

yes.description: Automatically install daemon if missing (skip prompt)
yes.name: yes

target.description: Target entity as type:id (e.g., issue:2, doc:getting-started)
target.name: target

unlink.description: Remove a link between two entities
examples: <%= config.bin %> unlink doc getting-started issue:5 --project my-project

type.description: Specific link type to remove (removes all link types if omitted)
type.name: type

project.description: Project name or path (defaults to current directory)
project.name: project

version.description: Show CLI and daemon version information

file.description: Path to the file to add
file.name: file

add:asset.description: Add an asset to an issue, PR, or as a shared asset

issue.description: Issue ID or display number to attach the asset to
issue.name: issue

pr.description: PR ID or display number to attach the asset to

shared.description: Add as a shared asset (accessible by all issues/PRs)
shared.name: shared

project.name: project

project.name: project

slug.name: slug

project.description: Project name or path (defaults to current directory)

create:issue.description: Create a new issue in the .centy folder
examples: <%= config.bin %> create issue --title "Bug in login" --priority high
<%= config.bin %> create issue -t "Add feature" -d "Implement dark mode"

project.description: Project name or path (defaults to current directory)
project.name: project

create:org.description: Create a new organization to group projects

slug.description: Custom slug (auto-generated from name if not provided)
slug.name: slug

create:user.description: Create a new user in the project
examples: <%= config.bin %> create user --id john-doe --name "John Doe" --email john@example.com

id.description: User ID (slug format, auto-generated from name if not provided)
id.name: id

git-username.description: Git username (can be specified multiple times)
git-username.name: git-username

project.description: Project name or path (defaults to current directory)
project.name: project

daemon:autostart.description: Configure daemon to start automatically on boot

duplicate:doc.description: Duplicate a doc (same project or different project)
examples: <%= config.bin %> duplicate doc spec --to ../other --new-slug spec-copy --title "Spec Copy"

to.description: Target project path (defaults to same project if not specified)
to.name: to

title.description: Title for the duplicate (defaults to "Copy of {original}")
title.name: title
